You\'ll earn AppCoins Credits when buying items in your favorite apps and games.
You\'ll earn AppCoins Credits when buying items in your favorite apps and games.

Enjoy a %1$s bonus and %2$s AppCoins Credits extra.
%s AppCoins Credits extra will be credited in your wallet.
There are no payment methods available to top up in your country at the moment. Stay tuned!
The token to buy in-app items! Top up AppCoins Credits from your wallet or get them for free by using apps. They can also be transferred between friends!
Make a purchase on your favorite game and we\'ll handle everything.
You will be refunded immediately. Your payment method will be verified shortly.
A minimal transaction of %s will be made to confirm your account. It will be refunded immediately.
Oops, your time expired. Start again!
It seems you reached the attempts limit. Please wait to try again.
You don\'t have enough ETH to pay for the gas.
You don\'t have enough AppCoins to complete this purchase.
You don\'t have enough AppCoins Credits, try topping up!
There was a problem with your card. Please try with a different card or payment method.
The transaction has been rejected by your bank. Please try with a different card or payment method.
It seems you don\'t have enough funds or there\'s a limit on your card. Please try with a different card or payment method.
It seems your card is expired. Please try again with a different payment method.
Invalid card number. Please check it and try again.
Your card is not supported yet. Please try again with a different card or payment method.
It seems you registered this card long time ago! Insert the card details again or use a different one.
It seems your phone number is not compatible with this payment method.
Your carrier doesn\'t support payments for less than %s.
Your carrier doesn\'t support payments for more than %s.
Oops, we\'re having issues with this purchase. Please contact us.
It seems something isn\'t ok with your wallet. Please contact us.
Try to complete the purchase after verifying your wallet.
Oops… Something is going on! Please try with a different payment method or contact us.
It seems your top-up amount is too high! Please try with a lower one or contact us!
Oops… Something is going on! Try with a different payment method or top-up amount.
That\'s quite expensive! Please try purchasing an item of a lower value.
That\'s quite expensive! Please try purchasing a cheaper item or try a different payment method.
AppCoins transfers fees are paid in Ethereum, so you\'ll need ETH to transfer AppCoins.
Invalid bank card number. Please make sure all digits are correct.
There was an error on the 2nd level validation of this transaction. Please try again.
It seems you took too long to complete the transaction. Please try again.
Your request was already processed or is in progress. Please wait.
The transaction has been rejected. Please try with a different card or payment method.

Verify your card to complete this purchase.
You\'ll need to install Paytm UPI app.

It seems there is a problem with your internet connection! Please check it and try again.
There was a problem with your pin. Please try again.
There was a problem with your 3D authentication. Please try again.
Oops, something went wrong. Please try again or contact us.
For security reasons, your wallet has been blocked. Please contact us for more information.
There was a problem with your PayPal payment. Please try again or use a different payment method.
Use these AppCoins Credits to make purchases in your favorite games!
Once you receive the AppCoins Credits, use them to make purchases in your favorite games!
You need to verify your payment method to participate in the Referral Program. We\'ll sent you a verification code via SMS.
Receive %s worth of AppCoins Credits for each friend. You first need to verify your payment method.

All purchases and top-ups made with any payment method apart from AppCoins Credits will qualify to increase your level and receive rewards.

No promotions available at the moment.
Please use your finger or password to continue.
Let us know what went wrong and we\'ll work on it.
We\'re glad you like our app. Can you help us by rating us on the app store?
Rate the AppCoins Wallet on the app store so we can improve it.
Verify your credit/debit card to make payments.
We\'ll charge %s to your card, and we\'ll refund it once you confirm the code. Depending on your bank, it can take between minutes and up to a few days.
Check the code in the transaction details
A unique code will appear in the summary of the transaction provided by your card issuer.

You\'ll get %s%% extra bonus in all your purchases.

This promo code is no longer available.
Oops! This code couldn\'t be applied.

AppCoins is a digital token created by Aptoide and used by more than 200 million users worldwide. The main goal of this innovative payment solution is to provide trust in the apps economy and to remove intermediaries.
Like all digital tokens, AppCoins value changes constantly in relation to your preferred currency (EUR, USD...). You can track these changes over time in the graphic above.

Both AppCoins and AppCoins Credits can be used to make payments in your favorite apps. You\'ll receive AppCoins Credits as a bonus when making a purchase with any other payment method (bank card, PayPal...) and also when topping up your AppCoins Wallet.
You don\'t have any NFTs in this wallet yet!
